summary: CAN YOU ENHANCE THE EFFECTS OF INTERMITTENT FASTING WITH A SAUNA – READ HERE
title: CAN YOU ENHANCE THE EFFECTS OF INTERMITTENT FASTING WITH A SAUNA – READ HERE
body:
The second cycle is the ‘appropriation’ cycle and this is when one who practices intermittent fasting will consume their calories. Digestion is at an all-time high here and this is when you want to get the majority of your eating out of the way. Then, the third cycle is ‘assimilation’ which is when your body is absorbing the nutrients which were consumed earlier in the day. Time-restricted feeding is the most common intermittent fasting method. According to participants of time-restricted IF, they argue it’s best to consume calories between 12 pm and 8 pm.

Another method of fasting is ‘whole-day fasting’. This is much less common and requires a complete 24-hour period where no eating takes place followed by a 24-hour period of regular eating.

Although sauna use is not always common with time-restricted feeding and whole day fasting, the difference it can make is huge. That said, in any sort of fasting and sauna situation, you want to ensure you’re eating healthy and drinking enough water. You may be at a dehydration risk so always ensure you’re drinking water before, during, and after to keep yourself on point.

Intermittent fasting only works when you consume no more than your recommended daily calories. Consume any more during your eating time window and there’s no point to fasting. Therefore, any fasting you do should be a compliment to ongoing weight management and detoxification programs. For optimum results through infrared sauna heat therapy, this cannot operate independently of other factors. All should be combined into a single program.

Sweating in a sauna, combined with time-restricted fasting, will promote weight loss, improve mental acuity, and potentially reduce the symptoms or likelihood of developing certain chronic conditions. If you are working with a dietician or personal trainer for your intermittent fasting, discuss with them your desire to incorporate a sauna into your program. Many are surprised at how much more weight they can lose and the positive impact an infrared sauna can have on them, even after only a single session.

Buy your infrared sauna, steam room, or traditional Finnish sauna today from Steam Sauna. Combine it with intermittent fasting and sustain yourself on a healthy, active lifestyle.

Source : http://steam-sauna.com/blog/can-you-enhance-the-effects-of-intermittent-fasting-with-a-sauna-read-here.html

summary: 10 Valentine`s Day Gifts For Fitness Enthusiasts
title: 10 Valentine`s Day Gifts For Fitness Enthusiasts
body:
If you ever wondered just what to obtain your better half for valentine’s day presents, we’ve obtained your responses. Who says the extremely fit cannot indulge and also enjoy? Enjoy!

Valentine’s Day is rapidly approaching and also for some that implies it’s time to discover a tacky card, a box of mediocre delicious chocolates and also most likely make a last minute supper booking someplace you forgot your better half doesn’t also like. Just how around something different this year?

Ditch the card, the mediocre delicious chocolate as well as the crappy dinner. Let’s get that physical fitness lover better half of yours something they’re actually mosting likely to utilize as well as enjoy. And also, most of us understand those chocolates are going to rest on the dining room table for at the very least a month before among you throws them away. If you typically aren’t great at assuming outside package, no worries, we’ve got you covered. Sit back, unwind and allow us find the excellent Valentine’s Day gift for any kind of health and fitness enthusiast.

10 Valentine’s Day Gifts…

# 1 Daily Harvest Healthy protein Smoothies

Daily Harvest provides frozen, ready to mix healthy smoothies straight to your substantial other’s door. All there is to do is include a liquid base as well as mix it for a nourishing, protein-filled smoothie. Daily Harvest Smoothies are made from natural as well as unrefined ingredients. You do not have to stress over chemicals or synthetic growth hormonal agents. It’s just the most effective for your enjoyed one.

They utilize a wide range of incredibly foods like matcha, hemp, flax seed, kale, wheatgrass as well as nut butter. The smoothie mixes are created by the company’s very own nutritional expert so they taste incredible. Choose between six healthy smoothies, 12 smoothies or 18 shakes. You could have them delivered once a week, every 2 weeks or every 4 weeks. Costs differ, but each prices around $7.99 and delivery is complimentary which is super convenient.

The healthy smoothies can be found in 14 different tastes including: Peaches for Me, Mint Chipper, Cacao Kapow, Wake and also Cake, Environment-friendly Monkey, Easy Being Environment-friendly, What a Melon, Dr. Mango and also Mornin’ MoJoe. As if the smoothies do not look delicious enough, the names make us wish to slurp them up right now.

#2 Yoga Mat

You don’t need to be very into yoga to appreciate the advantages of a yoga exercise floor covering. Despite your type of exercise, a floor covering supplies cushioning and support for your body. It’s likewise a terrific a barrier versus the bare floor. If you’re stretching or working out away from residence, you do not have to stress about a dirty floor. A yoga floor covering is likewise terrific when it comes to soaking up sweat. Obviously, this could be a huge consider workouts or stretching where you could slip.

Besides all of the other benefits, getting your enjoyed one a yoga floor covering may be a great method to get them begun on something new. The physical and psychological health and wellness advantages that yoga gives countless so giving it a try is certainly worth it.

There are different sizes, colors, structures and qualities of a yoga mat so selecting one to fit a certain lifestyle might seem a bit complicated. You obtain what you spend for. Anything that’s a name brand as well as thick need to last a lengthy time so you could get your money’s worth out of it.

#3 FitBit

There are a few different variations of the FitBit. The bright side is that every one is suited to your way of living– as well as your wallet.

The FitBit Zip is least expensive option, costing around $59.95. It merely clips onto the waist of your shorts, pants or also bra and also works as both a digital pedometer and calorie counter. The FitBit Zip is available in 4 different colors, with wireless syncing and is water immune. Next off up is the FitBit One. This costs $99.95 as well as resembles the Zip the way it clips on to your shorts, pants or bra straps. The FitBit One has a clock and also display screen, tracks your sleep, comes with an alarm system, has cordless syncing, digital pedometer and also tracks your calories.

Lastly, there’s the FitBit Flex. This has all the very same abilities as the FitBit One, but it remains in arm band type as well as sets you back $99.95. It comes in 10 various colors and also is water resistant, so it’s fantastic for all sort of exercise. If you really desire to ruin your enjoyed one, after that you could preorder them the FitBit Blaze. This is like a wise watch. It has a touchscreen face and tracks your heart price, sleep task, actions, calories as well as has access to songs, calls, texts, GENERAL PRACTITIONER and calendar alerts. This bad child comes in three various shades, has a five-day battery life as well as sets you back $199.95. It’s far better than an arrangement of roses.

#4 Features

Most of the time, socks aren’t exactly the most enchanting product to get your loved one. We think Attributes might change your mind. Every set of socks you acquire has a lifetime guarantee. These socks are especially developed as well as developed for the health and fitness lover.

The heels of the sock attribute a Y-heel building to keep the sock from gliding into your footwear. It utilizes high-density knitting that provides an extra long lasting sock, in addition to a softer sock, with much less thickness. Each sock includes power bands of Lycra that’s made to contour to the form of your foot as well as delivers the specific amount of compression so the sock fits and encouraging. This results in the socks staying securely in position and getting rid of motion in between the foot and also sock that usually creates blisters.

One of the very best components about Feetures is the seam-free toe. The seam-free toe is designed to ensure that the inside and beyond the sock are entirely smooth and you don’t have actually that discomfort brought on by standard toe joints. There are 4 various performance levels. Each level deals with your demands and way of life and also comes complete with various pillow levels. Whether they’re a runner, walker or cyclist, Feetures has the perfect sock for your liked one’s lifestyle. Maybe socks still aren’t thought about charming, but no matter, these would certainly be the present that continues giving.

#5 RunnerBox

This is best for any type of health and fitness fanatic. RunnerBox is generally a gigantic goodie bag that is provided directly to your door each month with products developed for each way of living. You choose how much time you desire your subscription to be. It can be four months, six months, twelve months or perpetual.

There are three various kinds of boxes. There’s the RunnerBox (geared towards runners), the TriBox (for triathletes) as well as the CycleBox (tailored to cyclists). Each box is handpicked with items that are essential as well as valuable to among those 3 kinds. The products include: Energy bars, chews, protein drinks, personal treatment products and various other devices. They also create limited version boxes like the Race Survival Set box, the Physical fitness Beginner Package box where RunnerBox coordinated with Fitbook and the Birthday celebration Box.

The RunnerBox is most definitely no box of chocolates, but that’s what we enjoy about it. It’s full of enjoyable health and fitness items and scrumptious rewards that any physical fitness lover would approve of. And also, if you obtain one of the memberships, this will be an additional gift that goes on providing in the very best way.

#6 Theraband Resistance Bands

Resistance bands are a need to for those that exercise consistently. Not just are they extremely inexpensive, yet likewise they are appropriate for a variety of different exercises. Therabands come in a variety of options including 8 different color-coded levels of resistance. Despite whether you’re a newbie or a professional, functioning out alone or with a companion, you’ll never have to stress over getting the most out of your job out.

For some exercises, you can use Theraband resistance bands to replace weights. Because hand weights can usually set you back a pricey dime, you’ll be saving yourself some cash– plus they don’t use up near as much room as some various other exercise devices (excellent for traveling, also).

The benefits to owning your very own collection of resistance bands are bountiful. Discover the perfect exercise that is centered on Theraband resistance bands or use them as the excellent physical fitness device. We believe your Valentine prefer to have these even more than a pink bear the size of a cars and truck. Do not you?

# 7 Thermos Connected Hydration Container with Smart Lid

This is probably the most ingenious and also high tech water bottle you have actually ever before seen or even though it has to do with $60, it’s worth every dime. The Thermos Connected Hydration Container with Smart Cover determines your suggested hydration goal based on your very own individual information– so it’s distinct to you as well as your body. It determines just how much water you consume alcohol and offers temperature readings.

It accumulates your hydration information and charts it daily, weekly and also month-to-month. It does all of this simply by downloading and install the totally free Thermos Smart Lid app on your smartphone. Just what’s our favorite component? It collaborates with that FitBit you were disputing whether or not to acquire your Valentine. With FitBit, your water intake will immediately sync with the Thermos Smart Lid application each time you hydrate.

Plus, it is Bluetooth connected with a line of vision series of up to 75 feet. The Smart Cover is rechargeable and the water bottle itself holds up to 24 ounces. Currently don’t obtain us wrong, we appreciate a great bottle of wine. We assume this water container would certainly make a person much happier as well as less hungover on Valentine’s Day.

#8 FlipBelt

When you’re attempting to go to the gym or go on a run, the last thing you want to stress around is all the stuff you have to bring with you. As long as you want to leave your secrets, cellular phone, purse, ID, headphones as well as credit score cards in your home, you can’t. A FlipBelt is the ideal service for this common problem. It’s generally a slim, elastic version of a fanny pack.

This tubular belt has pockets all over so you could keep your individual products while you’re being a physical fitness fiend. It’s light, it’s not an armband, which could chafe and obstruct, as well as it extends, not just to fit you, however likewise to fit every one of the little things you have to take with you.

Plus, the FlipBelt doesn’t move. So whether you’re treking or jumping rope, you’ll never have to bother with it gliding off or bopping up as well as down with you, which is incredibly irritating. The FlipBelt can be found in a selection of shades and dimensions due to the fact that personalization is vital. This enjoyable workout necessity simply blew that edible arrangement from the water– or the gym.

#9 Jaybird Wireless Buds

Earbuds are a battle generally when it concerns working out. They drop out of your ears, the cords obtain captured on points as well as they are continuously obtaining tangled. Well the earbud gods have actually provided us Jaybird wireless buds.

These earbuds connect to your songs player wirelessly or via Bluetooth, so you never ever need to stress over those cables while doing burpees. They’re developed to fit securely in your ear and are crafted for convenience. They are rechargeable so you never ever need to tinker batteries when they have a complete charge they last approximately eight hours.

What makes Jaybird cordless buds special to any kind of workout fanatic is that they’re even sweat-proof. These might cost a rather dime, around $180, yet with all they need to supply and also the usage you’ll get out of them, they’ll pay for themselves. This would certainly be one Valentine’s Day gift your enjoyed one will remember.

#10 Dr. Cool and Dr. Hot Bags

These Valentine’s Day gifts are absolutely on the unusual side of present giving. Both are in the form of an IV bag. As odd as they look they in fact have a wellness associated purpose.

The Dr. Cool bag can be cooled in the refrigerator, while the Dr. Hot bag warms up on its own or can be reused by putting it in boiling water for those sore muscles after a long, laborious exercise. Instead of getting an amusing card, get these rather– we believe they’ll make a lot more of an impact.

Conclusion

Valentine’s Day does not have to be just a Trademark holiday. Acquiring delicious chocolates and roses might do the trick for some, however, for those who want health and fitness and a love for aching muscle mass, these enjoyable and also fit concepts are the best presents for your Valentine.

#autenticità #caseificio #Cnr #Cnr-Ispaam #Health&Food...
caption:
Come smascherare il latte straniero nella mozzarella di bufala
#autenticità #caseificio #Cnr #Cnr-Ispaam #Health&Food #Italyinfofood #latte #Metrofood #MozzarelladiBufala #MozzarelladiBufalaCampanaDop #produzioni #Qualità #Sicurezza #Test #tracciabilità
COMUNICATO STAMPA - CNR Un test per scoprire la presenza di latte importato in un prodotto derivante da materie prime italiane, come la mozzarella di bufala campana Dop. È quanto elaborato dall’Istituto per il sistema produzione animale in ambiente mediterraneo del Consiglio nazionale delle ricerche e pubblicato su Food Chemistry I ricercatori dell’Istituto per il sistema produzione animale in ambiente mediterraneo del Consiglio nazionale delle ricerche (Cnr-Ispaam) hanno messo a punto un sistema in grado di rilevare una delle forme di adulterazione più comuni della mozzarella di bufala campana DOP. Lo studio, pubblicato su Food Chemistry, attraverso l’analisi proteomica delle…

summary: [Question] An experiment with large carb intake via /r/Paleo
title: [Question] An experiment with large carb intake via /r/Paleo
body:
On keto this is considered “cheating” and such posts are not allowed as it may discourage or tempt some of the redditors on keto. Hopefully it is ok here.

Occasionally I do food experiments where I try to monitor the effect of this food or that food. I currently eat mostly keto so <20g carbs per day, but probably more like around 30g carbs.

Last night I went way above that with a pint of regular icecream. I think this alone was over 100g carbs. I felt good for awhile, and then of course there was a sugar crash later, but it was around bedtime so it worked out ok. This morning though, I woke with anxiety, and that’s not normal for me.

Anyone else have issues with high carb intake affecting mood?



Submitted May 21, 2019 at 05:51AM by Jay-jay1
via reddit http://bit.ly/2WZXJao

summary: Hikers' Chunky Granola Snack Nutrient-rich seeds, dried fruits and coconut mixed with locally-made Seven Sundays Muesli. The...
caption:
Hikers’ Chunky Granola Snack

Nutrient-rich seeds, dried fruits and coconut mixed with locally-made Seven Sundays Muesli. The perfect healthy, on-the-go snack.

4-6 servings
Preparation time: 15 minutes
Cook time: 40 minutes

Ingredients
2 cups Seven Sundays Muesli (any flavor; we used the Cinnamon Currant mix)
2 tablespoons egg whites
¼ cup pumpkin seeds, roasted and unsalted
¼ cup Full Circle Unsweetened Coconut Flakes
3 tablespoons sesame seeds
1 tablespoon chia seeds
⅛ teaspoon sea salt
½ cup dried cherries or cranberries
2 tablespoons butter
1 tablespoon coconut oil
¼ cup brown cane sugar
1 tablespoon maple syrup
1 tablespoon honey

Directions

  1. Heat oven to 275 F. Line a cookie sheet pan with parchment paper.
  2. In a bowl, combine Seven Sundays Muesli and egg whites until well distributed. Set aside.
  3. In a separate bowl, mix pumpkin seeds, coconut, sesame seeds, chia seeds, sea salt and dried cherries. Set aside.
  4. In a medium saucepan, combine remaining ingredients; whisk over medium heat until sugar is dissolved and mixture is emulsified. Remove from heat.
  5. Mix muesli with seed and fruit mixture. Pour in sugar mixture and stir with a spatula until well coated.
  6. Pour onto the prepared sheet pan and press into an oval shape that is ⅓-inch thick, pressing down to keep the mixture together. Note: The mixture should not fit the pan entirely or it will be too thin.
  7. Bake for 40 minutes. Cool completely at room temperature. Once cool, break into large chunks and store in an airtight container for up to 2 weeks.

Cook time: 40 minutes

Ingredients
2 cups Seven Sundays Muesli (any flavor; we used the Cinnamon Currant mix)
2 tablespoons egg whites
¼ cup pumpkin seeds, roasted and unsalted
¼ cup Full Circle Unsweetened Coconut Flakes
3 tablespoons sesame seeds
1 tablespoon chia seeds
⅛ teaspoon sea salt
½ cup dried cherries or cranberries
2 tablespoons butter
1 tablespoon coconut oil
¼ cup brown cane sugar
1 tablespoon maple syrup
1 tablespoon honey

Directions

  1. Heat oven to 275 F. Line a cookie sheet pan with parchment paper.
  2. In a bowl, combine Seven Sundays Muesli and egg whites until well distributed. Set aside.
  3. In a separate bowl, mix pumpkin seeds, coconut, sesame seeds, chia seeds, sea salt and dried cherries. Set aside.
  4. In a medium saucepan, combine remaining ingredients; whisk over medium heat until sugar is dissolved and mixture is emulsified. Remove from heat.
  5. Mix muesli with seed and fruit mixture. Pour in sugar mixture and stir with a spatula until well coated.
  6. Pour onto the prepared sheet pan and press into an oval shape that is ⅓-inch thick, pressing down to keep the mixture together. Note: The mixture should not fit the pan entirely or it will be too thin.
  7. Bake for 40 minutes. Cool completely at room temperature. Once cool, break into large chunks and store in an airtight container for up to 2 weeks.
